wordpressPage.title: Women’s Club
wordpressPage.content:
Pittsburgh Angels and Pittsburgh Highlander Women following their match.

Join us for the Fall 2019 Competitive Season! Training is scheduled to begin in mid – August on Tuesday and Thursday evenings at Kennard Playground located at 2300 Reed Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15219. We will be working from at 8:00 PM until 10:00 PM. Please check the club’s calendar for the most up to date information.

For the 2019 – 2020 Competitive Cycle, the Pittsburgh Forge Women’s Club will be participating in the Midwest Competition Region’s second (DII) division. Training for the spring competitive season will began on Tuesday, August 27, 2019.

The goal of the Forge is to be an inclusive club that offers valuable and ample playing opportunities for all club members regardless of skill, age or competitive level.

Please feel free to contact us now for more information.

FORGE WOMEN’S LEADERSHIP

Head Coach: Alex Ramirez
Assistant Coach: Desiree Markovich

Director of Women’s Rugby: Kirsten Andrews
Match Secretary: Nikole Burkett

Captain(s): Chelsey Mitchell & Karina Sarver
